import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./style.css"; import "./footer.css"; import banner from './png/0be63c1a-e2fd-46a7-915f-e2517fbb11a0_WumpusBackground.png'; import logo from './png/b17d025faa92614dc539185498f10277.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Typical from 'react-typical' import Typing from 'react-typing-animation'; /* */ function openWindowDiscord() { window.open("https://discord.gg/xqaAmeWzCe", "_blank") } function openWindowDonate() { window.open("https://donate.wumpus.land/", "_blank") } function openWindowSimplify() { window.open("https://discord.gg/PaGJGzbzw6", "_blank") } export function HomePage(props) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const navSlide = () => { const burger = document.querySelector('.burger'); burger.classList.toggle('toggle') if (open) { setOpen(false) } else if (!open) { setOpen(true) } } return (
